meanings.sent1: The freer helped the bird fly out of the cage.
meanings.sent2: The freer rescued the trapped animals from the forest.
meanings.sent3: The freer magician made the rabbits disappear from the hat.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a freer, setting people's hearts free from sadness.
meanings.sent5: The freer of worries, she always brought a smile to everyone's face.

meanings.sent1: She felt freer after finishing her homework.
meanings.sent2: The birds seemed freer when flying in the open sky.
meanings.sent3: The freer breeze made the hot day more bearable.
meanings.sent4: His mind was freer to explore new ideas after the exam.
meanings.sent5: The freer path through the forest was more inviting to the hikers.

meanings.sent1: She will freer the trapped butterfly from the jar.
meanings.sent2: The key will freer the lock and open the door.
meanings.sent3: He tried to freer his thoughts from worries by meditating.
meanings.sent4: The truth will freer you from the burden of lies.
meanings.sent5: Her determination will freer her from any obstacles in her way.
